Tustin.California InterContinental University:
California Intercontinental University' is an online for-profit university located in the state of California in the United States.


== Academics ==
California Intercontinental University offers students online Associate, Bachelor's, and Master's programs in Business Administration, Information Technology, Management, and Healthcare. The university offers flexible degree programs, enabling learners to complete a Master of Business Administration (MBA) in 24–36 months and a Doctorate of Business Administration (DBA) in 44–60 months.
